type: Legendary Creature – Human Soldier Lord Noble
rules_text:
First strike, vigilance; Exalted
When this creature transforms into Chrom, King of Ylisse, create the Exalted Falchion and attach it to Chrom.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Chrom attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, Chrom and that other creature gains indestructible until end of turn.
